name: 1000 Tiny Claws [PSPM]
description:
Your LEGENDARY sky-pirate crew may have been responsible for unleashing an apocalyptic SWARM curse upon the world – and now there’s only 24 hours to save their necks...

TAKE TO THE SKIES! Send your enemies flying whilst swinging a GIGANTIC SWORD!

SMASH your way through the relentless insect horde in this stunning sword-swinging arcade battler set against an epic backdrop of sky-islands and piracy!

Use combo and running attacks, blocks and dodges, and DEVASTATING special moves to turn the tables on the SWARM, and survive against overwhelming odds!

Join Captain Bluebell and Rana as they DEAL OUT pirate justice! Make BARELY COHERENT plans! ENJOY celebratory fruit cocktails!

...and BREAK the curse of 1000 TINY CLAWS!

• Story mode featuring 25 levels over 5 unique stages
• 12 Unique enemies
• 3 Epic Boss battles
• 5 Survival Mode Stages
• 25 Challenge Mode Stages
• 16 Revealing Ships Log entries to discover
• 15 Booty Awards to Win
• 6 Animated Piratical cut-scenes



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
